titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide a limited overtime exemption for employees performing emergency medical services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 3/29/1996--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide a limited overtime exemption for employees performing emergency medical services and transport (including paramedics, emergency medical technicians, and rescue and ambulance service personnel).
